overview: This file controls how the game groups levels together. This has currently no gameplay purpose and is mainly used for condensing level names in desecrated (terror) zone messaging.

data_fields.name: Name
data_fields.description: Defines the unique name pointer for the level group, which is used in other files

data_fields.name: Id
data_fields.description: Defines the unique numeric ID for the level group, which is used in other files GroupName â€“ String Field. Used for displaying the name of the level group, such as when all levels in a group have been desecrated.
